name: coherent_beam
description: Form a coherent (tied-array) beam from MWA voltage data

name: incoherent_beam
description: Form an incoherent beam from MWA voltage data

name: rfi_mitigation_impulsive
description: Mitigation algorithm to identify impulsive RFI signals

name: rfi_mitigation_periodic
description: Mitigation algorithm to identify periodic RFI signals ('birdies')

name: dedispersion
description: Dedispersion algorithm to create dedispersed timeseries for searching

name: folding
description: Fold a dataset with a given ephemeris/pulsar characteristics

name: FDAS
description: Fourier Domain Acceleration Search (i.e., a FFT search)

name: candidate_clustering
description: Candidate clustering (within/between search types, observations, etc.)
